alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Highland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 7:27AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL BROWN, NORTHWESTERN ADAMS AND HIGHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 800 AM EST... At 727 AM EST, a strong thunderstorm was located over Sardinia, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 35 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Hillsboro, Mount Orab, Marshall, Sardinia, Belfast, Rocky Fork Point, Highland Holiday, New Market, Emerald, Mowrystown, Sinking Spring, Rocky Fork Lake, Danville in Highland County, Lake Waynoka, Rainsboro, Buford and Fincastle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
